thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: sheri

author: sheri
title: sheri
text:
Thrift books is more than likely a good place to obtain books. I haven't done business with them enough to form a lasting opinion and I am basing "books dated" on three books purchased.
I was quite surprised and disappointed to find that "The Road to Perdition" was a comic book.
I gave all three books to the local library for their spring book sale.
Most food recipes can be found easily online and shouldn't I have ordered any cookbooks.
I may order more books in the future.
